Pre-Game Insights: Both USA and Canada have pledged an enterprising brand of cricket for their T20 World Cup opener
USA went 21 months without a T20 International, eventually turning out for seven matches across April and May
Canada have been boosted by the likes of Shadley van Schalkwyk, Harmeet Singh, Andries Gous and Corey Anderson, all now calling USA their home
Post-Match Reflections: No post-match reflections provided in the article
